original_text: I the Lord search the heart, I try the reins, even to give every man according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings.
korean_text: 나 여호와는 심장을 살피며 폐부를 시험하고 각각 그의 행위와 그의 행실대로 보응하나니

sentences.original_text: to give every man according to his ways
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람에게 그 행위대로 주려 함이며

sentences.original_text: according to the fruit of his doings
